offlineOnly.label: Offline Only Mode
offlineOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you aren't streaming

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

saveUserlist.label: Save Userlist
saveUserlist.tooltip: True if you want to save all of the users who are in the hosting queue in users.txt

useBlacklist.label: Use Blacklist
useBlacklist.tooltip: Enable/Disable blacklist that keeps track of everyone who was already hosted

blacklistCooldown.label: Remove user from blacklist after (minutes)
blacklistCooldown.tooltip: Minutes after the person who got hosted is removed from the blacklist

useCosts.label: Use costs for the command
useCosts.tooltip: Enable/Disable user cost for using the command

costs.label: Cost to use the command
costs.tooltip: Set the default cost for this command.

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user you need $cost $currency to use $command. Currently you have only $points $currency.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of currency
 $cost = Cost to play
 $command = Name of command

blacklistResponse.label: Blacklist response
blacklistResponse.value: $user, you are still in the blacklist! Wait $cd more minutes before writing $command again!
blacklistResponse.tooltip:
Message that the bot will display when a user is inside the blacklist. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
Message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
Message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

addedResponse.value: $user, you have been added to the hosting list! Someone will be hosted in $remaining minutes!
addedResponse.label: Added in the list response
addedResponse.tooltip: Message sent when the user gets successfully added to the userlist. Use $user to get the username.

alreadyResponse.value: $user, you are already in the hosting list! Someone will be hosted in $remaining minutes!
alreadyResponse.label: Aldready in the list response
alreadyResponse.tooltip: Message sent when the user tries to get in the userlist when he is already there
